body_html:
@damienmg The tests are failing due to the following error:

ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/workspace/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 219
        _cuda_toolkit_path(repository_ctx)
    File "/workspace/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 72, in _cuda_toolkit_path
        fail("Cannot find cuda toolkit path.")
Cannot find cuda toolkit path.

I still need to figure out why the CI machine cannot find cuda.

body:
@damienmg The tests are failing due to the following error:

```
ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/workspace/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 219
        _cuda_toolkit_path(repository_ctx)
    File "/workspace/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 72, in _cuda_toolkit_path
        fail("Cannot find cuda toolkit path.")
Cannot find cuda toolkit path.
```

I still need to figure out why the CI machine cannot find cuda.
